column1: * [[Eärendil]] and [[Elwing]] reach [[Aman]]. Eärendil delivers the message of the [[Children of Ilúvatar
* The Valar answer Eärendil and agree to help the peoples of [[Middle-earth]] against [[Morgoth]].<ref name="Earendil">{{S

* [[Eärendil]] and [[Elwing]] are told that they must choose which Kindred to be counted amongst. The both choose to be counted as elves. The choice is also extended to their sons, [[Elrond]] and [[Elros]].<ref name="Earendil"/>
* Wearing the [[Silmaril]], Eärendil is borne up in his ship [[Vingilótë]] as a [[Star of Eärendil
